summary: Adds an enchantment that doubles damage on all sneak attacks.
descriptionHtml:
It always bothered me how the Dark Brotherhood gauntlets only doubled melee damage. I created a new enchantment that doubles all weapon damage on sneak except unarmed while I\'ll add in later on.

There was a mod I used that had this enchantment included in it. I don\'t use that mod anymore but I wanted to keep the enchantment so I made it myself.

I created gauntlets so you can learn the enchantment to put it on any gauntlets you want. Type \"player.additem <item ID> 1\" into the console. To find the item ID type \"help sabotage 0\" into the console. There should be an armor item named Leather Gauntlets of Sabotage. 

Warning: This could unbalance the game

Installation: Use NMM or drop the .esp into the skyrim/data folder.
author: TheExclamationPoint

files.name: Sabotage
files.changelogHtml: All weapon damage is doubled while sneaking.
